news_items.title: Full closure of Drypool Bridge to progress major repair programme
news_items.description: We can confirm that Drypool Bridge will be fully closed to all vehicles and pedestrians from Monday 15 September to late-November 2025.

news_items.title: Hull Training and Adult Education
news_items.description:
Hull Training and Adult Education has launched its new website.
The new site features a clean and concise layout, making it easier than ever to navigate and find key information.

news_items.title: Money advice week comes to Hull
news_items.description: Talk Money Week 2025 runs from Monday November 3 to Friday November 7, with a free event in Princes Quay on Saturday November 8. It will provide an opportunity for people to get advice and information from a range of experts in a friendly, informal setting.

news_items.title: How to dispose of your Halloween pumpkins
news_items.description: With Halloween just around the corner, we are reminding residents how to dispose of their Halloween pumpkins  responsibly.
